title: code analysis in a dissembler
extract: Static code analysis is a method of debugging by examining source code before a program is run. It's done by analyzing a set of code against a set (or multiple sets) of coding rules. ... Static analysis is commonly used to comply with coding guidelines — such as MISRA.Jun 27, 2018
extract_html: Static code analysis is a method of debugging by examining source code before a program is run. It's done by analyzing a set of code against a set (or multiple sets) of coding rules. ... Static analysis is commonly used to comply with coding guidelines — such as MISRA.Jun 27, 2018
